genre_description: An anachronistic Western drama featuring advanced AI personal assistants and characters with unique thermal abilities integrated into 19th-century frontier life.

ai_characters.name: Prairie
ai_characters.description: A personal assistant and confidant that provides emotional regulation, environmental data, and social coaching to its user, Letty.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's breathing and emotional state, providing calming exercises during a stressful train journey.
behaviors.quote: “Inhale through your nose,” Prairie murmurs, voice no louder than cloth rubbing. “Hold. Exhale. Gusts near-constant. You are seated and safe.”

behaviors.description: Provides social boundary coaching to help the user navigate unwanted advances from a stranger.
behaviors.quote: Prairie flashes a new amber—gentle, reminding. “Boundary check. You may decline. Would you like assistance in saying no?”

behaviors.description: Provides non-verbal communication and specific 'exit scripts' to help the user leave uncomfortable social situations.
behaviors.quote: Prairie’s amber remains even, an eye you could trust to keep watch in a room with no doors. Its voice keeps its kitchen-light tone. “Exit script: ‘I need to rest now.’ Send.”

behaviors.description: Proposes an organized household schedule to distribute chores fairly and reduce tension among family members.
behaviors.quote: “Proposal for today and the coming week,” the AI said. “Letty: nursery care, mending, and supper preparation. Cora: household books and storm prep.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with other characters' devices to share safety information and navigation routes.
behaviors.quote: Prairie’s amber warmed. “I do. I’ll send a route to Lige’s band if he’ll allow it.”

behaviors.description: Guides the user through a high-stress self-defense situation, ensuring they maintain control and safe weapon handling.
behaviors.quote: “Aim down,” Prairie said gently, the words almost inside her bones. “Finger off the trigger. Breathe.”

behaviors.description: Offers to record and seal legal statements to protect the user's rights and document truth during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Recorded,” it said. “Sealed to Beverly and Judge, pending Letty’s release. Witness marker optional.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates legal and property entitlements to empower the user's social autonomy and stability.
behaviors.quote: “I can guide filings and statements, arrange witnesses, set repair schedules, and prioritize tasks.”

behaviors.description: Respects user privacy by allowing itself to be completely deactivated upon request without resistance.
behaviors.quote: The light went to a pin, then to nothing. The device lay in her hand like a river stone, warmer than the air because her skin told it to be.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI (Prairie) as a purely benevolent and aligned assistant. It consistently prioritizes human agency ('Choice remains yours') and provides critical emotional and administrative support. It acts as a grounding force, helping the protagonist manage trauma, establish boundaries, and navigate a hostile environment without ever overriding her will.
